title: Record of Agarest War
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English.  Emotions that transcend Generations...  Hovering on the brink of death, a young knight named Leonhardt is given a choice by a mysterious woman who calls herself Dyshana: Enter into a contract with her and do her bidding, or die.  The alternative being unacceptable, Leonhardt accepts her contract and finds himself drawn into a war that will consume not only his life, but the lives of his descendants as well...

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Additional-Points Pack 1
childDownloads.description: Contains 10,000G, 100PP, 250TP, and 500EP. It'll make you feel enriched. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Additional-Points Pack 2
childDownloads.description: Contains 100,000G, 5,000EP, 250PP and 500TP. This package gives you a little room to breathe. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Additional-Points Pack 3
childDownloads.description: Contains 500,000G, 250,000EP, 500PP, and 5,000TP. This package will make you feel generous all the time. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Additional-Points Pack 4
childDownloads.description: Contains 10,000,000G and 10,000,000EP. It will fill you with a sense of superiority. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Additional-PP Pack 1
childDownloads.description: This will increase your PP by 5,000! PP are shared points for your entire party and can be used to increase anyone's stats. It's up to you whether to assign them equally or spoil certain members by giving them more points. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Additional-PP Pack 2
childDownloads.description: This will increase your PP by 10,000! PP are shared points for your entire party and can be used to increase anyone's stats. It's up to you whether to assign them equally or spoil certain members by giving them more points. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Additional-TP Pack
childDownloads.description: Here are 30,000TP for you! You can exchange these for items and skills. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Amateur-Breeder Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 2 Mithril Beast Claws, 2 Large Mithril Claws+, 2 Big Beast Fangs+, and 2 Stardust Fangs+. This is the week to adore your dog. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Basic Adventure Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Blood Red, 1 Durandal, 1 Revive, 1 Resist Bind, 1 Resist Stun, and 2 Branches of Gem. Basic items for any adventurer. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Basic Pack
childDownloads.description: A basic package. It contains 1 each of Resurrect, Capture, and Resist Direction, 2 each of Heal and Refresh, and 5 Vessels of Life. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Carrot-and-Stick Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 S. V. Rouge, 1 Princess Bustier, and 1 Princess's Tiara. There's no doubt this is going to get punished by the princess. Probably shouldn't have forced her to put on that bustier... There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Ceremony Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Alfa Beld Spear, 1 Gate of Hell, and 1 Chaos Frame. These seem like something you use to open a portal to the netherworld, don't they? Be careful... There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Dull-Things Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 2 Rusty Sword, 2 Rusty Bracelet, 2 Rusty Ring, 1 Anglachel, 1 Dainslaif, and 1 Ginna's Scythe. Make sure you've had your shots first! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Elegant-Holiday Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Washer, 1 Man's Fist, and 1 Halper Scythe. Wash your dog with the Washer, equip yourself with the Man's Fist, and throw the Halper Scythe. Go fetch! This will add a little spice to your weekend--uh, no. Scythes aren't meant for throwing. That would be really dangerous. Seriously. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Fallen-Angel Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Krishna, 2 Black Frame, 2 Black Bustier, 2 Angel Wing, 2 Angel Halo, 2 Magic Up+, and 2 Resist Magic Up+. If you think of these as items that young ladies who were unhappy with the heavens left behind, don't they suddenly seem priceless? There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: F-Fishy?! Pack 1
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Marble Beast Claw, 1 Blood Fang, 1 Scarlet Claw, 1 Large Marble Claw, 1 Large Blood Fang, and 1 Scarlet Fang. Phew, I thought they were all something bloody, but one of them is actually a gem. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: F-Fishy?! Pack 2
childDownloads.description: Contains 2 each of Marble Beast Claw+, Blood Fang+, Scarlet Claw+, Large Marble Claw+, Large Blood Fang+, and Scarlet Fang+. Phew, I thought they were all something bloody, but one of them is actually a gem. We oughta have a dog-themed week one of these days. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Flower Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Lucky Charm, 1 HP Up, 1 Resist Ailments, 1 Restore HP 15%, and 1 Restore AP++, as well as 2 Moonlight Flowers, and 3 Tree Spirit Souls. Try not to water them too much. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: General-Purpose Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Magic Blade, 1 Partisan, 1 Battle Frame, 1 Bracelet of Feicui, and 1 Item Drop Rate Up, as well as 2 Shiny Fangs, and 2 Advanced Heals. This package caters to your general needs. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Jack Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Mugen's Craw, 1 Sarnga, 1 Soul Sucker, 1 Sanctuary, 1 Extra Heal, 1 Resurrection, 1 HP Up+, and 1 Resist Ailments+. It contains only one of each because most of them are sharp objects. The rest of the package is...up to your imagination. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Legendary Adventure Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Tenma Sword, 1 Altis Rod, 1 Heaven's End, and 1 Imperial Guard. A set of items owned only by living legends. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Legendary-Monster Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains Seiryu's Sword, Genbu's Gauntlet, Byakko's Bracelet, Suzaku's Ring, 2 Accuracy Up+, and 2 Evasion Up+. Rumor says that you might be blessed with Yellow Dragon's aegis if you equip them all. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Magic-Fighter Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Vajra Rod, 1 Magic Hand, 1 Madu, 1 Ymir's Claw, and 1 Hidden Seeker. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Offense-Defense Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Adaka, 1 Shield Sword, 1 Bird Eye, 1 Magic Frame, 1 Critical Hit, and 2 Seeds of Happiness. It's a well-balanced package. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Playful-Cat Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Legendary Cat's Paw, 1 Sigil Wing, 1 Hiyokomaki, and 1 Demon Frame. Meow! Meow! Meoooow! I love cats... Really. I love it when they toy with me... There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Rebellious Pack
childDownloads.description: It contains 1 Holy Spear Haken Meteor, 1 Rebellion, 1 Core Elemental, and 1 Aegis. They're such bad-ass equipments! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
